title: Rubber Juggle
summary: Rubber Juggle is a minigame for the annual GMTK Game Jam where you try and keep balloons corralled as long as possible.
long_summary: Rubber Juggle is a minigame made for the annual GMTK Game Jam. The goal is to keep balloons corralled in your pegboard by joining pegs with rubber bands. How high a score can you get?

gallery.alt: A couple balloons on a pegboard, kept within by rubber bands wrapped around pegs.
gallery.caption: Keep balloons in with rubber bands
